For the next level you need at least 2500 points. Points count for speed and accuracy. Max points you can score at level: 5000. Max points at location for accuracy is: 800 Max points at location for speed is: 200 " Try to guess as many location as you can for a limited time game. Time is added or subtr–∞cted based on your accuracy. Start limit is: 30 secs For accurate guessing location: +10 secs For incorrect guessing: -10 secs Application Version GeoChallengeGame - A game for the development of your geographical intuition. Guess cities and attractions on the map of the whole world. Get competiton with your friends in leaderboard and various modes. Challenge yourself on the world map by guessing over 8,000 locations! Developers Rexedead and Danbi
